title: [CY] Have you got a Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN)?

pip.subtitle: [CY] This is the letter DWP sent you when you asked them to reconsider their decision about the {{benefitType}} benefit.

esa.subtitle: [CY] This is the letter DWP sent you when you asked them to reconsider their decision about the {{benefitType}} benefit.

uc.subtitle: [CY] The MRN is the letter DWP added to your online journal when you asked them to reconsider their Universal Credit decision.
uc.subtitle_para2: [CY] Find your MRN in your Universal Credit online journal (opens in a new window).
